price: نو الله لپاره مثالونه مه جوړوئ، بې شکه الله پوهيږي، او تاسو نه پوهيږئ.
arabic: فَلَا تَضۡرِبُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: falā taḍribū lillahi al-amthāla inna al-laha yaʿlamu wa-antum lā taʿlamūna
